alert.note: Alert for Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 6:55PM EST until January 07 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SATURDAY TO 6 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Somerset. * WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 6 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Total snow accumulations up to 3 inches for Northern Somerset County. Snowfall totals will be reduced for lower elevations and more central and southern areas of the county.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
